data.name: Machine Shop Simulator
data.description:
Step into a captivating VR world of woodworking with Machine Shop Simulator! This immersive game lets you operate a virtual lathe and bring your creativity to life through 10 meticulously designed levels. Feel the realistic haptics as you chisel and carve your wooden masterpiece, each level offering a unique challenge and result.

The workshop atmosphere is yours to control, with 10 songs, each providing a distinct ambience for your crafting experience. Whether you prefer a peaceful melody or an upbeat rhythm, the choice is yours as you shape the perfect piece of wood.

But the adventure doesn't stop there. Keep an eye out for future updates introducing new techniques and machinery, such as CNC Milling, Drilling, Cutting, and Plating. Your virtual woodworking journey will expand with more exciting opportunities and challenges.

Whether you're a seasoned craftsman or a curious beginner looking to explore the art of woodworking, Machine Shop Simulator offers an immersive, engaging, and rewarding VR experience. Slip on your VR headset, and step into the world of a craftsman as you carve your path in woodworking!
